Description

Service class for interacting with the Google Calendar data API

Description

Create Gdata_Calendar object

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$client Zend_Http_Client | (optional) The HTTP client to use when when communicating with the Google servers. null
$applicationId string | The identity of the app in the form of Company-AppName-Version MyCompany-MyApp-1.0
